channel.title: The author, Séamas O'Reilly / @shockproofbeats
channel.description: Twitter feed for: @shockproofbeats. Generated by nitter.42l.fr

item.title: RT by @shockproofbeats: Occasionally I am reminded of my all time favourite piece of internet: this Reddit post from 6 years ago in which a guy claims he ruined dinner with his girlfriend's parents, after he refused to stop saying he didn't know what a potato was.
item.dc:creator: @shockproofbeats
item.description: Occasionally I am reminded of my all time favourite piece of internet: this Reddit post from 6 years ago in which a guy claims he ruined dinner with his girlfriend's parents, after he refused to stop saying he didn't know what a potato was.

item.title: R to @shockproofbeats: At one point, his character injects his "heart" with adrenaline, but it's clear that the injection site is in his stomach. Cage claims this - and his decision to sit cross legged for the scene - was a conscious private choice, intended to invoke the imagery of seppuku.
item.dc:creator: @shockproofbeats
item.description: At one point, his character injects his "heart" with adrenaline, but it's clear that the injection site is in his stomach. Cage claims this - and his decision to sit cross legged for the scene - was a conscious private choice, intended to invoke the imagery of seppuku.

item.title: R to @kibblesmith: Special commendation to Nicholas Cage on The Rock commentary, who stressed that his performance was, to a baffling extent, based on his love of kabuki theatre.
item.dc:creator: @shockproofbeats
item.description: Special commendation to Nicholas Cage on The Rock commentary, who stressed that his performance was, to a baffling extent, based on his love of kabuki theatre.

item.title: In the grand realm of overthinking comedy nerds, Joel is a cruel, strutting king - I've just backed this and suggest you do the same.

item.title:
R to @shockproofbeats: how do i tell all the people arguing about voltage in my replies that this was 99% an excuse to write a headline in the New York Times' clause-mangling house style.
From Handsome Writer's "Kettle" Tweet, Fresh Dilemmas Arise.
item.dc:creator: @shockproofbeats

item.title: Savile exonerated 14 murder victims, 7 of whom were children. Blaming it, and not the Government, for not "achieving reconciliation" is pretty repugnant, considering the Tories made *refusing to prosecute anyone based on its findings* a fucking campaign pledge.
item.dc:creator: @shockproofbeats
item.description:
Savile exonerated 14 murder victims, 7 of whom were children. Blaming it, and not the Government, for not "achieving reconciliation" is pretty repugnant, considering the Tories made *refusing to prosecute anyone based on its findings* a fucking campaign pledge.

item.title: RT by @shockproofbeats: Gypsies & Travellers existence is illegal as of today. There’s too much I can say, but honestly, I’d just end up upsetting too many.
item.dc:creator: @thatbloodyMikey
item.description: Gypsies & Travellers existence is illegal as of today. There’s too much I can say, but honestly, I’d just end up upsetting too many.

item.title: RT by @shockproofbeats: There are people on the Conservative grift circuit who imho are just saying what they think the punters want, your Grimeses and your Foxes, but Montie is the truest of true believers. He is a man to be feared, not to be mocked.
item.dc:creator: @Dara_bhur_gCara
item.description: There are people on the Conservative grift circuit who imho are just saying what they think the punters want, your Grimeses and your Foxes, but Montie is the truest of true believers. He is a man to be feared, not to be mocked.

item.title: RT by @shockproofbeats: Nobody is complaining ( as Starmer implies) that he has changed his mind since he was a teenager. The issue is that he has dropped every single one of the 10 pledges he made in 2020 to get elected leader.
item.dc:creator: @HackneyAbbott
item.description: Nobody is complaining ( as Starmer implies) that he has changed his mind since he was a teenager. The issue is that he has dropped every single one of the 10 pledges he made in 2020 to get elected leader.

item.title: RT by @shockproofbeats: From today GRT in the UK are criminalised as a nomadic people due to the Policing Act. Irish Travellers are criminalised in Ireland since 2002. Solidarity in our journey for equality.
item.dc:creator: @Minceirbeoir
item.description: From today GRT in the UK are criminalised as a nomadic people due to the Policing Act. Irish Travellers are criminalised in Ireland since 2002. Solidarity in our journey for equality.

item.title:
RT by @shockproofbeats: Devoted the last 15 years of my life to reading literature so i could help bring you this.
Kudos to @CharlieFBBaker1 @shockproofbeats @_F_B_G_ @alexschristian @kf_morris for writing all the jokes but still allowing me to take all the money – incredibly generous lads one and all
